heading: Transparent Portfolio
content: Publicly share portfolio holdings and real performance, so readers can follow the long-term DCA strategy without being distracted by short-term noise.

heading: Simple and Practical
content: A minimalist DCA approach—no chasing trends or predicting the market. Perfect for busy investors who still want sustainable wealth growth.

heading: Reports and Analysis

heading: Reader-Centered Design
